configuration.response: To configure your email settings, go to Settings > Email and enter your SMTP server details.
You can customize your dashboard layout by dragging and dropping widgets in the Dashboard Settings.
To set up two-factor authentication, navigate to Security Settings and follow the setup wizard.
Your API keys can be managed in the Developer Settings section. Remember to keep them secure.
To configure backup settings, go to System > Backup and select your preferred backup schedule.
You can customize notification preferences in the Notification Center under User Settings.
To set up custom domains, visit the Domain Settings page and follow the DNS configuration guide.
Your integration settings can be configured in the Integrations tab. Select your desired services to connect.
To configure user roles and permissions, go to Administration > User Management.
You can customize your theme and appearance in the Theme Settings section.
